official_title: Prospective Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial: Superior Hypogastric Nerve Block for Pain Control After Uterine Artery Embolization: Effect of Addition of Steroids on Duration of Analgesia
inclusion_criteria:
* females
* aged between 30 and 60 years
* diagnosed with symptomatic uterine fibroids and/or adenomyosis and scheduled to undergo UAE procedure
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 30 Years
Must have maximum age of 60 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Contraindications to UAE
* SHNB is deemed unsafe for the patient
* Allergies to local anesthetic or steroid agent
* History of inflammatory bowel disease or ulcerative colitis
* Uncorrectable abnormal coagulation profile
* Diabetes mellitus
